name: Pawn Shop
long_description: The Store Clerk, who is sitting in a rusty protective cage, doesn't bother looking up from his magazine as you enter. You see some dusty old computers on the Shelves behind the Counter.
short_description: Looks like there's a lot of junk for sale.
